pageContext.claim: “I just cannot state strongly enough how totally dishonest much of the Media is. Truth doesn’t matter to them, they only have their hatred & agenda. This includes fake books, which come out about me all the time, always anonymous sources, and are pure fiction. Enemy of the People!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tends to call "fake news" any media reports that he does not like.  It is simply false that 80 percent of the news reporting is invented or fraudulent.
